domain.description: The name of the domain containing the workflow executions to count.

executionFilter.description: If specified, only workflow executions matching the WorkflowId in the filter are counted. executionFilter, typeFilter and tagFilter are mutually exclusive. You can specify at most one of these in a request.

startTimeFilter.description: Specifies the start time criteria that workflow executions must meet in order to be counted.

tagFilter.description: If specified, only executions that have a tag that matches the filter are counted. executionFilter, typeFilter and tagFilter are mutually exclusive. You can specify at most one of these in a request.

typeFilter.description: Specifies the type of the workflow executions to be counted. executionFilter, typeFilter and tagFilter are mutually exclusive. You can specify at most one of these in a request.
